text: arau tumi phiraistasakalaka dekhiba ye, te'omloke arachara carai'ophale gherai dharai nija pratipalakara saprasansa paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karai ache. Te'omlokara majata n'yayara saite bicara karaa ha’ba arau koraa ha’ba, ‘sakalo dharanara prasansa srstijagatara raba allaharae'i praapya’
